resources.string: 1000s of movies, Wowie Max exclusives and more
Watch the movie from Wowie Max now!
An unknown error occurred while creating the list!

Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse is about the adventures of Miles Morales, equipped with special abilities, who stepped into a completely different world after being bitten by a radioactive spider. Reuniting with Gwen Stacy, Miles crosses the Multiverse. Meanwhile, Miles encounters the Spider-Humans, who are responsible for protecting the place no matter what. Faced with a great threat, the heroes don\'t know what to do, and Miles finds himself in front of the other Spiders. Miles must use his abilities to protect the people he loves most from a great threat.

When his brother is killed, LAPD officer Mark leaves town to return to the island where he grew up. Seeking answers and revenge, Mark finds himself in a bloody battle with a corrupt rich man who has taken over the island\'s paradise.

Pursuing a promising cure for his cancer, John Kramer travels to Mexico to undergo an experimental treatment, only to learn that he has been the victim of a scam. Now scammers are falling victim to Jigsaw\'s new game.

At a competition, talented and ruthless hairdressers learn that one of their own has died before the competition begins. As the contestants roam the neon-lit halls in search of the murderer among them, their long-simmering anger and lies come to light.
In this installment of the series, four survivors of the Ghostface murders leave Woodsboro behind and try to turn a new leaf in New York City.

Despite having many fans and a beautiful girlfriend, TV reporter Bruce Nolan believes life isn\'t fair to him. After the worst day of his life, Bruce angrily accuses God of ruining his life and failing to rule the universe well. Then God answers... And donates all his strength to Bruce to see if he can do better...

Deadly Skirmish focuses on a Chinese private security guard played by Jackie Chan. When a China-based oil refinery in the Middle East is attacked, the security guard is asked to rescue the oil workers. When it is understood that the attackers\' aim is to steal oil, the security guard works with an American ex-marine (John Cena) to stop the attackers.

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem begins when the turtle brothers, who have been protected from the human world for years, act together with the desire to win the hearts of the people of New York by performing heroic acts and to live among them as normal teenagers. As they strive towards that end, their fellow reporter April O\'Neil, who undertakes the task of introducing them to the public, helps them take down a mysterious criminal organization. However, they soon realize that they are trying to do great things when a huge army of mutants is unleashed on them.
Police officer Ming-han\'s life takes a frightening turn when he finds a strange letter. Now married to a ghost, Ming-han must solve a crime case with his wife.
The film is based on the true story of a national spiritual awakening in the early 1970s and the origins of a community of young hippies in Southern California.
The film tells the story of the American scientist J. Robert Oppenheimer and her role in the development of the atomic bomb.
Indiana Jones and the Dial of Destiny

Indiana Jones and the Dial of Fate tells the story of the famous archaeologist preparing for retirement, who finds himself in a new adventure. The respected professor of archeology, Dr. Indiana Jones is about to retire after years of teaching at Hunter College in New York. Retiring and living a peaceful life is actually ideal for Jones, as the archaeologist constantly struggles to find his way in a world beyond his mind. But as the claws of an all-too-familiar evil return in the guise of an old rival, Indiana Jones must put on his hat and once again wield his whip to keep an ancient and powerful artifact from falling into the wrong hands.

Mykola adlı eski bir Ukraynalı fizik öğretmeni, 2014 yılında Donbas bölgesinde işgalci askerlerin elinde anlamsız bir trajedi yaşadıktan sonra, barışçıl yaşam tarzından vazgeçer ve intikam arayışına girer. Orduya katıldıktan ve keskin nişancı olarak imrenilen bir yer edindikten sonra gözünü, ortadan kaldırılması çatışmanın gidişatını değiştirebilecek seçkin bir Rus keskin nişancısına diker.

John Wick is a retired hitman. While enjoying his retirement, his life is turned upside down by the incurable illness of his wife. His most valuable asset and companion dog is his wife. However, three gangsters breaking into his house kill him as well. One of the gangsters is Josef Tasarov, son of mob boss Viggo Tasarov, and a man John had worked with before. Now with nothing to lose, John Wick only wants revenge and gets into a breathtaking chase with his enemies on the streets of New York.

Philippe, a wealthy aristocrat injured after a paragliding accident, hires suburban Driss to help him at home. Driss, on the other hand, has just been released from prison and is not at all suitable for the job. But these two men are somewhat alike. Although they belong to completely different worlds and have different tastes in everything, they form a friendship that is both extraordinary and strong...

Stanley Ipkiss (Jim Carrey) is a good-hearted bank teller. One day, he puts on an antique mask he finds and transforms into a creature with incredible powers. Our hero, popularly known as The Mask, accidentally becomes the target of a mafia leader named Dorian Tyrel (Peter Greene).
The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

Tuco (ugly) is an outlaw with a bounty on him. Collaborating with the sniper, a cowboy named Blondie (good), they travel through towns. Handing over Tuco to the law enforcement, Blondie takes the prize and saves Tuco from hanging at the last moment. When things go wrong in a town, their partnership falls apart.
